title: Server Swapping
body: Me and my friends were planning to change from EUNE to EUW on season start but it appears that buying region swap is still unavailable, anyone have a clue when it will be back live?

replies.body: Since they're still trying to figure out exactly what's wrong and how it needs to be fixed, they, unfortunately, don't know precisely when they will reliably be fixed. The time frame they're aiming for is late Jan/early Feb, and [**HollyMonster **](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/rlu6awv4-transfer-service-update)did mention some type of discount in the update she posted.
